channel.title: [FM] Paint Your Mafia.. Mafia - Signups - (15/15) - Backups accepted
channel.description:
https://www.wallpaperflare.com/static/379/671/828/mafia-ii-artwork-mafia-video-games-wallpaper.jpg
# [color]Paint Your Mafia... Mafia[/color] *This game is part of 2nd anniversary event.*
### Game information: > **Start date:** 29/09 > **Phases:** 48 / 24 > **Lynch:** Plurality deadline > **Posting requierments:** 10 posts per game day. > **Night actions:** 1 hour before day start. > **Mafia kill:** Factional, asigned, nonexclusive. > **Feedback:** Feedbackless > > **Wincons:** > The win condition of the [color]**Town**[/color] faction is to eliminate every member of the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] faction and eliminate all harmful [color=silver]**Neutrals**[/color], shall they exist. > > The win condition of the [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] faction is to have as many members alive as there are living members of the [color]**Town**[/color] faction and eliminate all harmful [color=silver]**Neutrals**[/color], shall they exist. > > Other wincons might or might not exist.
### Mechanics: > Majority of both factions consist of "Painters". > > Each painter may each night submit a painting of night action they want to perform. No words / letters can be used on the picture. > Host will try their best to interpret the painting and perform action which they think is on the picture. > > However, since being an artist is all about originality, if 2 or more people send picture which will be interpreted as same action. (For example **"kill Luxy"** and **"kill firekitten"**), those actions will be canceled out and not work. > > Converts and revives are disabled for the purpose of this game.
### 2nd anniversary: > This game is part of 2nd anniversary event. > > Participants will be awarded lottery tickets for 2nd anniversary lottery. > In case of replacements, tickets will be split betwen players up to host discretion.
## Playerlist: 1. Alice 2. Maximus 3. Geyde 4. Jake 5. Sulit 6. Mercenary 7. Simon 7. Icibalus 8. BlueStorm 9. SirDerpsALot 10. PKR 11. Isaac 12. Magnus 13. Nuclear 14. Maxwell

Is he redskin? No

Give them strings, which are fake BPV.

I understand.
